document_data.mainbody:
Koleth was a tavernkeeper inhabiting the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Koleth ran the Tesh-Wave tavern located on the waterfront of Zhentil Keeps Foreign Quarter on the south bank of the River Tesh. He weathered the destruction of Zhentil Keep in the , by boarding up the tavern and waiting in the basement until the violence ceased.
